caption.p: Annual mean minimum temperature (°C) (a) winter minimum temperature (°C) (b) annual mean summer temperature (°C) (c) and annual rainfall (mm) (d) from 1901 to 2014 at the 0.5 × 0.5° grid cell containing the eastern part of the sul‐riograndense highlands, where São Francisco de Paula and the studied forests are located in subtropical South America. The dashed line in the rainfall plot highlights 1965, the year from which a growing trend was detected in the data. Data from CRU (Harris et al., 2014)
